name: Missles
description:
This is a Missle Command clone I made for this challenge: https://www.gamedev.net/forums/topic/693936-2018-new-year-challenge-missile-comm...
It's programmed in LÖVE and source is available on https://github.com/FRex/Missles .

If you want to play on Linux or Mac you can also use the source and download LÖVE separately.
